long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New to work from home? Monitor your remote team with automated screenshots for just $1.99/user.

Workfolio is an extension to replace your offline offices and run your office in the online. Time tracking, screenshots, task planner all can be done through Workfolio.
